attributes.action: invest more to education and rehabilitation to stop crime
attributes.additional_details: So reoffending rates can decrease and the world can be more peaceful
attributes.background: Put more of our tax money into education and rehabilitation

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure exactly what type of rehabilitation and education you'd like the Government or Parliament to introduce. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
